name: When asleep
description:
Have you ever taken into consideration why your brain reduces its activity when you fall asleep?

Let's play When asleep  and manage your neurons to prevent your brain from nightmares and passing out. Keep your core saturated and free from incubus. That will allow you to sleep through the night. You'll be rested and happy.

Click on neuron to activate or deactivate it. Pay attention not to disconnect your core nor see too much nightmares. Good luck.
